channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2023081819
item.description:
Report X-2023081819

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: CHANTILLY
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was removed from trailer and placed to the side to be put on a pallet and taken to truck. Orientation arrows on the package were not followed and it started to leak. was found early before much leaked out and placed upright on a pallet for QA. DescribePack: One of the lids to one of the bottles was loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed upright following orientation arrows.

item.title: Report X-2023080902
item.description:
Report X-2023080902

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-16T00:32:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: HAMPTON
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to Hazmat specialist for processing. Package handler did not have information on incident. DescribePack: The package was packed inside of a box which allowed the box to move around inside of the other box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was repacked and placed under a hood. Material was placed inside of Hazmat Bag and in a repacked box with cardboard. Waiting for disposition from PGH.
